game.title: The Lost Jewel
game.description: In a land far away, an ancient jewel has been stolen from the kingdom. The king has requested your help in retrieving the jewel and restoring it to its rightful place.

tasks.description: The village elder may have information on the whereabouts of the stolen jewel. Speak to him in the village.
Legends speak of a hidden temple in the enchanted forest. Explore the forest and search for clues leading to the jewel.

tasks.objective: Defeat the guardian of the temple
tasks.description: To reach the temple, you must defeat its guardian, a fearsome dragon. Prepare yourself for battle and prove your strength.
The ancient jewel is said to be kept in a hidden chamber within the temple. Explore the temple, solve puzzles, and recover the jewel.
